name: 王謹誠
objective:
車輛工程師之職業道德與責任，車輛工業發展簡介，本系各實驗室及老師之專長，實務專題等之介紹。
Morality and responsibility of vehicle engineers, introduction to development of vehicular industries, introduction to laboratories and faculty of this department, introduction to special projects.

consultation: Office Hours: Monday and Thursday 2 PM to 5 PM @ Integrated Technology Complex, Room 526-21. Available after class or by appointment at other times. No homework assistance by e-mail.
